name: Filmographics.com
overview:
Filmographics.com provides film information in graphical form so that it is easily understandable for movie lovers.

Movies has always been and will be the first and foremost entertainer for 90% of the world population. There are many websites in internet bringing information regarding movies reviews and ratings. Have you wondered of a website which brings whole information of a movie in a very insteresting and innovative way, this is your ultimate destination, introducing to the world Filmographics.com the first of its kind.

Guess what this could be? its an idea to bring information(Poster,cast and crew,storyline,Rating,First five days gross,Gender and agewise rating,critic and user reviews) regarding a movie in an easily understandable and virtually stunning single poster in graphical representation. This is first of it’s kind in whole internet history. Thanks to infographics, the core for this concept which is evolving new method of graphical representation.

Filmographics.com has been developed by a team of thriving professional’s, after several weeks of research & development to satisfy movie goers. No wonder in near future Filmographics.com will be a delight for movie goers’s and be frontier in movie information in internet. so way to go, just visit Filmographics.com and find out more information regarding your favourite movies in no matter of time.
